name: Chicken and Snow Pea Stir-fry
preparation: Mix chicken with oil and Asian Stir-fry Seasoning.
Heat Wok to medium and add chicken. Stir-fry for about 5 minutes, add Broth and bring to a gentle simmer.
Add snow peas and cook until tender and liquid is reduced by about half. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
tips: Make this a sweet and sour stir-fry by adding chunks of canned pineapple and a generous drizzle of white or cider vinegar towards the end of cooking.
This recipe can be easily made with shrimp or a combination of shrimp and chicken.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavours of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Wok & Glass Lid
summary: Classic Wok with curvy side & generous surface area for stir-frying.
